def assign(q):
    if(q=='+'):
        return 1
    else:
        return -1
dic={}
for _ in xrange(input()):
    li=[]
    for _ in xrange(input()):
        s,c=map(str,raw_input().split())
        if s not in li:
            li.append(s)
        dic[s]=c
    ans=0
    for i in xrange(len(li)):
        ans+=assign(dic[li[i]])
    print ans
